timeline.bodyText:
This logging pattern doesn't meet the requirements because it should have a descriptive error message and the caught throwable.
It may be like: log.error("Error creating parent directories for path", e);
timeline.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: Good idea to refactor it like that!
timeline.author: temanbrcom

timeline.bodyText: I would prefer to have these and following cosmetic changes (i.e. typos, documentation etc.) as a part of a separate PR with tag #23
timeline.author: temanbrcom

timeline.message:
fix: refactor on review #331

Signed-off-by: Azat Satklichov <azat.satklichov@broadcom.com>

timeline.bodyText: In this case, it won't print the stack trace of the exception. To do that, you may use the method Logger#error(String, Throwable)
timeline.author: temanbrcom
